name: danubedata
description: A Pulumi provider for managing DanubeData cloud infrastructure resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`danubedata` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/AdrianSilaghi/terraform-provider-danubedata).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi provider for managing DanubeData cloud infrastructure resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/AdrianSilaghi/terraform-provider-danubedata)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-danubedata` repo](https://github.com/AdrianSilaghi/pulumi-danubedata/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-danubedata` repo](https://github.com/AdrianSilaghi/terraform-provider-danubedata/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/AdrianSilaghi/terraform-provider-danubedata)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-danubedata` repo](https://github.com/AdrianSilaghi/pulumi-danubedata/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-danubedata` repo](https://github.com/AdrianSilaghi/terraform-provider-danubedata/issues).

apiToken.description: API token for DanubeData authentication. Can also be set via DANUBEDATA_API_TOKEN environment variable.

baseUrl.description:
Base URL for the DanubeData API. Defaults to https://danubedata.ro/api/v1. Can also be set via DANUBEDATA_BASE_URL
environment variable.

provider.description:
The provider type for the danubedata package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

apiToken.description: API token for DanubeData authentication. Can also be set via DANUBEDATA_API_TOKEN environment variable.

baseUrl.description:
Base URL for the DanubeData API. Defaults to https://danubedata.ro/api/v1. Can also be set via DANUBEDATA_BASE_URL
environment variable.

environment variable.
